verses.roman:
cāturmāsya tāṅhā prabhu śrī-vaiṣṇavera sane
goṅāila nṛtya-gīta-kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtane

synonyms: cāturmāsya—observance of the four months ot the rainy season; tāṅhā—there; prabhu—the Lord; śrī-vaiṣṇavera sane—with the Śrī Vaiṣṇavas; goṅāila—passed; nṛtya—dancing; gīta—singing; kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtane—in chanting the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu passed the Cāturmāsya months with the Śrī Vaiṣṇavas, dancing and singing, and also chanting the holy name of the Lord.
